## react package

A collection of React hooks for interacting with Cerbos policy decision points.

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CerbosProvider({ children, client, principal, auxData, })](./react.cerbosprovider.md)


</td><td>

A component to provide a Cerbos client to your application's components.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useCerbos()](./react.usecerbos.md)


</td><td>

A hook to access the Cerbos client passed down by the [`CerbosProvider()`](./react.cerbosprovider.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useCheckResource(request, options)](./react.usecheckresource.md)


</td><td>

Check the principal's permissions on a resource.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useCheckResources(request, options)](./react.usecheckresources.md)


</td><td>

Check the principal's permissions on a set of resources.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useIsAllowed(request, options)](./react.useisallowed.md)


</td><td>

Check if the principal is allowed to perform an action on a resource.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
